name: Astro Slinger
description:
Your blasters are down! Utilize your tractor beam to sling asteroids at nearby enemies! Rotate your ship to swing your tractor beam. The more asteroids you hold, the more damage you will do.

Controller required. 2-Player optional.

Controls

  • Turn: Left Joystick
  • Move Forward: Right Trigger
  • Reverse: Left Trigger
  • Break: Left and Right Trigger
  • Pause: Start
  • Restart Game: R
  • Toggle Fullscreen: F11 (macOS: Cmd+Ctrl+F)

All music and sound effects are licensed under Creative Commons 0.
